title: Brainstorming
summary: Write and sketch about alternate ideas for the website. The goal is to generate as many ideas as possible in a small amount of time. In this step remember no idea will be discarded, all Ideas are valid, the more diverse the ideas are the better.
before: We already need to have the direction set in our mind, what are the goals of the website, what are the goals of the people visiting them?
after: Now we can move on to selecting a idea(s) which matches with our requirements and fits with the brand perfectly.

key_steps.text: Write down keypoints that your website need to have. Then we can start writing  and sketching what can we do about those around it.

Now around those ideas write and sketch what more ideas you can do related to that idea. The goal here is to be quick, generate as many as possible there is no need to question any ideas right now, be inclusive.
